!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of Duty* is only given to those who pass the Trial of Duty. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. To take the Trial of Duty, visit *Grand Master Hannavalt of Giran Castle Town*. The *Mark of Life* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Life. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Test of Life, visit *Master Cardien of Dion Castle Town*. And finally the *Mark of the Healer* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Healer. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Healer, visit *Priest Bandellos at the temple of Giran Castle Town*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/03.htm|Return]Â
